name: UnitVM Executable File
summary: Learn about .UVM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Alien Green is a Georgian company that produces the Mostat thermostat and other smart devices. The devices contain microcontrollers that use Unit Virtual Machine as their operating system and run small executable programs saved in UVM files.

instructions: UVM files are not meant to be opened manually. Rather, UVM files come pre-installed on and are used by Alien Green smart devices.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
